name: Rattos with Hattos
description:
Play with your friends on  a single controller in this cute, multiplayer game! Made in 2.5 days at a 2nd Year AIE Student Game Jam, this short and sweet game will make you smile as you cooperate with a friend as two hardworking rats fulfilling orders of delicious food.

CONTROLS

Rattos with Hattos is designed for one controller only.

Left Joystick - Controls Rat on the left side of screen

Left Trigger (LT) - Picks up & drops items

Right Joystick - Controls Rat on the right side of the screen

Right Trigger (RT) - Picks up & drops items
